title: Las Posadas
description: Las Posadas is V. Castro's first Christmas horror novelette set in Texas.Nola has been single for years as she has put her success over love, but this Las Posadas she hopes to find something more with the gorgeous mortician who has just moved into town to take over the local funeral home after the owners die in a house fire.For weeks the tension has been building between Nola and Henry during their weekly meetings at Puzzle Club. At the start of Las Posadas, and her turn to host Puzzle Club, Nola has an unexpected guest in her new home.Pozole and pinata sticks at the ready...
author: V. Castro
